comment: It’s 2021 and I didn’t find something better than this haha ✌🏻

Thank you Andrey K, this really helped!

Many applications exist. One is using this law to approximate the composition of air. A second example can be used with scuba divers. Scuba divers have to be careful when diving because if they return to the surface too quickly, nitrogen can bubble out of the blood.
